        public static java.lang.String[] StringSplit(java.lang.String text,
                                             java.lang.String regex,
                                             boolean RemoveEmptyItems)
        NT-Split string by regex and optional remove empty elements from result array
        Parameters:
        text - Source string
        regex - regex string as described in String.split() function documentation. " " result " "; "k" "m " result "[km]" and so on...
        RemoveEmptyItems - if True - remove empty items from result array.
        Returns:
        Returns array of string's

        Parameters:
        text - Source string
        delimiter - Delimiter string as "="
        Returns:

      • FileWriterOpenOrCreate

        public static java.io.BufferedWriter FileWriterOpenOrCreate(java.lang.String fpath,
                                                            java.lang.String encoding)
                                                     throws java.io.IOException,
                                                            java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                            java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        NT-Open or Create text file.
        Parameters:
        fpath - file pathname string
        encoding - Text file encoding, "UTF-8" as sample.
        Returns:
        Function returns BufferedWriter object. Close it on exit!
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - General IO error.
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - File not found.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Unsupported encoding.

      • openBufferedReader

        public static java.io.BufferedReader openBufferedReader(java.lang.String filepath,
                                                        java.lang.String encoding)
                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        NT-Open Buffered Reader for read file with specified encoding.
        Parameters:
        filepath - File pathname.
        encoding - File text encoding. For example: UTF-8 UTF-16.
        Returns:
        Returns BufferedReader object ready for use.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - File not founded.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Wrong encoding title.

      • openBufferedWriter

        public static java.io.BufferedWriter openBufferedWriter(java.lang.String filepath,
                                                        java.lang.String encoding)
                                                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                                                        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException
        NT- Open Buffered Writer for write to file with specified encoding.
        Parameters:
        filepath - File pathname.
        encoding - File text encoding. For example: UTF-8 UTF-16.
        Returns:
        Returns BufferedWriter object ready for use.
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - File cannot be created.
        java.io.UnsupportedEncodingException - Wrong encoding title.

      • arrayContainsStringOrdinal

        public static boolean arrayContainsStringOrdinal(java.lang.String[] array,
                                                 java.lang.String sample,
                                                 boolean ignoreCase)
        NT-Проверить что указанный массив содержит указанную строку.
        Parameters:
        array - Массив строк.
        sample - Строка-образец для поиска.
        ignoreCase - Игнорировать регистр символов строки.
        Returns:
        Возвращает True, если массив содержит указанную строку; False в противном случае.
